### 2.1 Getting started with dplyr

A helpful resource for to consult for this task can be the [data wrangling cheatsheet](https://www.rstudio.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/data-wrangling-cheatsheet.pdf).

Before you start, make sure to load the `tidyverse` package and the `palmerpenguins` package.

```{r eval=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```
